titleStmt.title: A declaration of the causes, for the which, wee Frederick, by the grace of God King of Bohemia, Count Palatine of the Rhine, Elector of the sacred empire, &c. haue accepted of the crowne of Bohemia, and of the countryes thereunto annexed
Proclamations. 1619-11-07
titleStmt.author: Bohemia (Kingdom). Sovereign (1619-1620 : Frederick I)

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A68069 of text S121195 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 11351.3). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 29 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 12 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the causes, for the which, wee Frederick, by the grace of God King of Bohemia, Count Palatine of the Rhine, Elector of the sacred empire, &c. haue accepted of the crowne of Bohemia, and of the countryes thereunto annexed

titleStmt.author: Bohemia (Kingdom). Sovereign (1619-1620 : Frederick I)
Frederick I, King of Bohemia, 1596-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abraham Schilders [i.e. William Jones? or William Stansby?],

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen in our royall castle at Prague the 7. day of Nouember. 1619.
Actual place of publication and printer's name conjectured by STC. Apparently by the same printer as STC 10814.
Identified as STC 11351 on UMI microfilm reel 957.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 957 and at reel 1816 (same copy filmed twice).

keywords.term: Bohemia (Czech Republic) -- History -- 1618-1848 -- Early works to 1800.
